Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the state board of parole membership, interviews with incarcerated individuals, and determination of parole
Summary: Allows for the removal of members of the state board of parole by a majority vote in the senate and the assembly; requires three or more members of such board personally interview potential parolees; requires that the determination to parole an incarcerated individual be unanimous.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the state board of parole membership, interviews with incarcerated individuals, and determination of parole
